name: Divider
description: Divider is used to separate contents.

align.label: align
align.title: Alignment of the content, options are "left", "center", "right" for horizontal layout and "top", "center", "bottom" for vertical.

layout.label: layout
layout.title: Specifies the orientation, valid values are "horizontal" and "vertical".

type.label: type
type.title: Border style type, default is "solid" and other options are "dashed" and "dotted".

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.
